title: Creating design briefs
content:
Can anybody suggest a good text or resource to use as a guide (case study) upon which to construct a decent & thorough professional brief?

 [‹ Text face to partner with FB Griffith Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202190113/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37253 "Go to previous forum topic") [Dali: Painting & Film. The End. ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202190113/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36531 "Go to next forum topic")
